Title: Relates to penalties for the crimes relating to methamphetamine laboratory operations
Summary: Relates to penalties for the crimes relating to methamphetamine laboratory operations, including criminal possession of methamphetamine manufacturing materials and unlawful manufacture of methamphetamines.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to penalties for the crimes of criminal possession of methamphetamine manufacturing material and unlawful manufacture of methamphetamine
